question: You wake in the Jelly Realm. A dozen sentient jellies gather curiously around you...

options.text: Step forward and ask, “Who are you guys?”
Stay still and quietly observe every one of them

question: Welcome! Please proceed to the Gelatine Arena for your jelly trials

options.text: I need to prepare right away! What are the rules?!
Ooo exciting! I’ll just see where this goes

question: Ah yes — the flying jellies! That’s how we commute here. Come, follow me!

options.text: Cool! But how are they flying?
I wonder where are they flying to...

question: The Gelatine Arena doors swing open. A crowd of jellies claps and waves you in.

options.text: You wave back with a grin and stride in confidently
You give a small nod and quickly make your way inside

question: Take this magical jelly-drop. It will be your companion in the duels ahead.

options.text: Examine its smell, feel, and weight
Wonder what kind of power it might contain

question: Oh dear… Those two are arguing over their jelly-drops. One of them’s in tears..

options.text: Calmly find a fair solution for both sides
Comfort the crying jelly first

question: A jelly approaches you, wide-eyed and asks ‘Can I switch my jelly-drop with you?’

options.text: Swap without hesitation — they seem to need it
Ask why, then decide if it’s fair

question: The duel is about to begin. What will you do before the first strike?

options.text: Block out the noise and stay laser-focused
You wink at the crowd and strike a dramatic pose

question: Your opponent summons bubble bloom - a glowing orb bursting into many erratic bouncing bubbles

options.text: Dodge between the bubbles and counter mid-air.
Try to block the attacks with your magical fruit

question: One of the jelly bubbles lands on your arm and crystallizes — not harmful, but painful.

options.text: That was a calculated strike. Well played.
Damn, that was close!

question: It’s your turn! Your jelly-drop is charged with magic. Where do you aim?

options.text: An unexpected area that might catch them off guard
The crack in your opponent’s defense - you spotted it earlier

question: Your attack lands clean and filled with purpose. The arena glows with lingering jelly magic...

options.text: Keeps jellywand back in your pocket — no loose ends.
Watches what the magic becomes
